text: Ham bhī dūsroṅ kī tarah Yahūdī qaum ke haiṅ, aur hamāre bachche un se kam haisiyat nahīṅ rakhte. To bhī hameṅ apne bachchoṅ ko ġhulāmī meṅ bechnā paṛtā hai tāki guzārā ho sake. Hamārī kuchh beṭiyāṅ launḍiyāṅ ban chukī haiṅ. Lekin ham ḳhud bebas haiṅ, kyoṅki hamāre khet aur angūr ke bāġh dūsroṅ ke qabze meṅ haiṅ.”
